GSD.description:
ext4: avoid remove directory when directory is corrupted

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit 835f95d6776012f3e8d8e97a7cd142c6215a38d2. For more details please see the references link.
